name: Lucifer's Nine Trophies
detailed_description:
Be prepared for intense horror.


Lucifer's Nine Trophies aims to achieve a very innovative and fun horror for the purpose of you and up to three friends to play locally or online.

  • Look around one of many maps in order in order to find all of Lucifer's trophies.
  • Play with up to three friends for intense fun and horror.
  • Get chased down by Lucifer while looking for his trophies.
  • Gather everything in the level in order to beat Lucifer; the trophy of Limbo, Lust, Gluttony, Greed, Wrath, Heresy, Violence, Fraud and Treachery.
  • Try and complete every single achievement and brag to your friends!
  • The game supports controllers, which means you have the ability to sit back and relax whilst playing with your friends.

Planned features

  • A wide new variety of maps.
  • Numerous different gamemodes to immerse yourself in.
  • Better networking system and compatibility with Steam Peer 2 Peer.
  • Official servers for the purpose of randoms to play with each other.

short_description: Play with up to three friends and look for all nine of Lucifer's trophies; Limbo, Lust, Gluttony, Greed, Wrath, Heresy, Violence, Fraud and Treachery. Find these trophies while getting chased down by Lucifer in order to win! Offers you many different maps to immerse yourself in.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: 3Ghz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
